jobs.title: Head of Growth
jobs.description:
**TLDR**
We are looking for a Head of Growth to own Guider’s Growth and Marketing strategy and execution.

**The Company.**
Guider is on a mission to give everyone access to the career and personal development they deserve. Our AI-powered mentoring and coaching platform connects the best mentors in organisations with those looking to learn and grow, creating an impactful culture of knowledge sharing and self-improvement. We're already working with some of the world's best known brands to help them develop their people, including Marks & Spencer, LVMH and Aviva. See this M&S case study video showing the impact we are having!

Guider also partners with companies who have a forward-thinking purpose. With this, Guider can tailor mentoring and coaching programmes to helping improve Diversity & Inclusion, Women in Leadership, High-Potentials and much more. If you're passionate about either self-development, mental health or diversity, then read on!
 
**The Role.**
As the Head of Growth, you will be responsible for Guider’s bottom line by owning the intersection between sales and marketing. An ideal candidate is someone who has B2B marketing and growth experience, ideally in a SaaS scale-up. This role would be responsible for the development and management of B2B marketing activities at Guider. With a focus on acquiring new customers through various marketing channels, including (but not limited to): PPC, SEO/SEM, paid social, email, social, webinars, lead nurturing, and analytics.  Also we’re after a strategic leader who can balance big-picture thinking while being able to execute based on rapid experimentation. On the strategic side, you will be involved with providing revenue models, trends and new opportunities for growth. Reporting to the Founder.

**The Responsibilities.**
* Plan and implement B2B digital marketing strategies across all channels
* Establishing and managing all digital advertising 
* Ownership of marketing lead generation
* Ownership of marketing metrics: tracking and reporting learnings and growth to assist business development
* Industry analysis to inform sales process and direct Guider’s positioning
* Ownership of growth/revenue models - short term and beyond (12-24 months)
* Researching and proposing additional opportunities for growth.

**About you.**
* 5+ years in a B2B Growth or Marketing role
* 3+ years in a scale-up/ Hyper-growth startup.
* A track record of exceeding revenue goals and consistently hitting targets
* An analytical mind and love of data
* Ability to think strategically and commercially 
* Experience establishing marketing channels from scratch
* Entrepreneurial mindset with a hunger to hit goals, learn by doing, and own entire areas of marketing
* Good understanding of Google Analytics and Google Ad Words (required)
* Good understanding of a variety of SEO tools such as Moz, SEM Rush, Ahrefs
* Exceptional organisational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects at once
* Ability to work agile - being comfortable with continuously shifting priorities
* A love of teamwork and collaboration

**The Benefits of Working at Guider.**
You will be part of a growing technology startup and help shape the future of self-development. Guider cares deeply about helping the technology industry become a more inclusive and diverse place and we work hard to lead by example.
 
**The Perks.**
* Free Food: Free Lunches on Thursdays and Fridays, via Feedr (Deliveroo for businesses).
* Unlimited breakfast: Every day. Breakfast (cereal, yogurt) and healthy snacks, nuts, hummus and fruit.
* Free drinks: Unlimited Beer and wine, Unlimited soft drinks, freshly ground coffee
* 25 Days Holidays
* A World’s Best Accelerator: We are a startup, amongst dozens of other startups.
 
Interested? Drop us an email at jobs@guider-ai.com with a cover letter outlining, in a few bullet points, why are suitable for the role. We will only consider an application that includes a cover letter.

jobs.title: Sales and Account Manager (HR and L&D)
jobs.description:
**The Headline.**
 
This is an exciting opportunity to join Guider as Sales and Account Manager (HR and L&D) for our growing Business
 
**The Company & Product.**
 
Guider's AI-powered software platform helps global brands deliver high impactful mentoring and coaching programmes within their organisation. The root of our mission - creating more productive and higher performing professionals.
 
We are revolutionising the way companies develop their people by providing entirely new insight into HR, L&D & People teams to help them demonstrate the positive impact they have on their people. Guider also partners with companies who have a forward-thinking purpose. With this Guider can tailor mentoring and coaching programmes to helping improve Diversity & Inclusion, Women in Leadership, High-Potentials and much more.
 
**The Role.**
 
The role of the as Sales and Account Manager (HR and L&D) . The key focus will be to support with closing deals and managing the onboarding of customers. Other duties include looking out for referrals and creating growth strategies for our existing clients. The key stakeholders will be C-Levels, HR and L&D (Learning and Development) leaders.
 
**About you.**
* You will be an entrepreneurial self starter
* 3+ years min experience in Sales and Account Management
* Have had experience selling and working with L&D, HR or Talent Leaders in large organisations.
* Proven track record of holding relationships with senior stakeholders.
* Proven track record of exceeding targets.
* Keen to work for a start-up and fast growing company.
* An outstanding communicator, with great written skills.
* Determined, but consultative approach.
* Ambitious and keen to learn new skills.
* Target driven, competitive.

**Nice to have.**
* Hungry, competitive mentality. 
* Consultative approach and solutions orientated.
* Experienced with training people.
* Have a background in HR, L&D, Training and People management.
* Worked in a start-up environment.
 
**The Benefits of Working at Guider.**
 
You will be part of a growing technology startup and help shape the future of learning. We work in a collaborative, flexible and friendly environment. Guider cares deeply about helping the technology industry become a more inclusive and diverse place and we work hard to lead by example.
 
**The Perks:**
* Free Food: Free Lunches on Thursdays and Fridays, via Feedr (Deliveroo for businesses).
* Unlimited breakfast: Every day. Breakfast (cereal, yogurt) and healthy snacks, nuts, hummus and fruit.
* Free drinks: Unlimited Beer and wine, Unlimited soft drinks, freshly ground coffee
* 24 Days Holidays
* Flexible Working.
* A World’s Best Accelerator: We are a startup, amongst dozens of other startups, inside a World’s best startup accelerator called Founders Factory, giving access to some of the very best free training, advice, and contacts. There are lots of events, networking, fun, banter and social events all take place here. 
* We have a modern, tech-focused and importantly fun culture in an open plan office (with quiet working spaces for breakout and brainstorming) but also a beer fridge and ping pong table - all shared with many of the UK’s brightest minds and most exciting businesses.
 
Interested? Drop us an email at jobs@guider-ai.com with a cover letter outlining, in a few bullet points, why are suitable for the role. We will only consider an application that includes a cover letter.
